name: Alchemy / Spirit Blade
effect: *A sharp sword produced by a Last Creator.*While [Equipped], once per round, gain +1 to an {Evasion} check.

name: Alchemy / Spirit Sword
effect: *A huge, western-style sword produced by a Last Creator.*While [Equipped], once per combat, [Halve] the [Armor] of the [Target] of a [Physical Attack].

name: High-Frequency Knife
effect: *A knife-like high-frequency blade modified for high performance.*While [Equipped], once per round, [Targets] of the user's [Physical Attacks] reduce their [Armor] by 2 (to a minimum of 0).

name: Black Wing Blade
effect: *An unidentified Japanese sword with a jet-black blade.*While [Equipped], once per combat, make a [Weapon Attack] after [Damage Calculation].

name: Lionheart
effect: *A gorgeously decorated magical broadsword. The blade's length is engraved with the language of another world, and has the motif of a lion.*While [Equipped], once per combat, gain +1 to an {Accuracy} check.

name: Haladie
effect: *A double-edged blade owned by members of an Indian warrior tribe. The handle also contains a blade, which makes the weapon a little difficult to handle.*While [Equipped], once per combat, make a [Weapon Attack] after [Damage Calculation].

name: Artisan's Blade
effect: *An unnamed sword forged by a certain master, converted into an artificial regalia. It is difficult to handle due to the way it interacts with spirit energy.*While [Equipped], once per round, gain +1 to an {Accuracy} or {Evasion} check.

name: Ring of Swords
effect: *A set of six rings, engraved with alchemic spells that summon blades. With them, you can create and control spirit swords.*While [Equipped], the target can [Equip] [Alchemy /○○] [Weapons] or [Protectors] (→p48-p63). Also, the target also gains +[100G] to the [Cost] limit of the [Consumables] created with <<Tool Refinement>>.

name: Sword Shield
effect: *A kite shield built for attack, with a blade on it's edge. It demonstrates considerable power when swung.*While [Equipped], gain +3 to [Armor] and [Barrier].

name: Urumi
effect: *A sword used in a martial art called Kalaripayattu. It requires high skill to operate.*While [Equipped], increase the [Range] of the user's [Physical Attacks] by 2 Sq. (If [Engaged], it becomes 3 Sq., if [Charge 2 Sq.], it becomes [Charge 4 Sq.]).

name: Black Flower's Thorn
effect: *A slender longsword with a jet-black blade. At first glance it looks unreliable, but it's very sturdy.*While [Equipped], once per combat, make a [Weapon Attack] after [Damage Calculation].

name: Sword Whip
effect: *A slender sword forged by a mysterious alchemist. By swinging it at high speed, it becomes a whip.*While [Equipped], twice per turn, change the [Range] of [Physical Attacks] to [6 Sq].

name: High-Frequency Sword
effect: *A normal sword that was converted into an Artificial Regalia. It has a mechanism within that allows the blade to vibrate at a special, high frequency.*While [Equipped], [Targets] reduce their [Armor] by 5 (to a minimum of 0).

name: Ring of the Holy Sword
effect: *A set of six rings, engraved with alchemic spells that summon holy swords. With them, you can create and control swords made from spirit energy.*While [Equipped], the target can [Equip] [Alchemy /○○] [Weapons] or [Protectors] (→p48-p63). Also, the target also gains +[100G] to the [Cost] limit of the [Consumables] created with <<Tool Refinement>>.

name: Fallen Heavenly Sword
effect: *A long japanese sword with a jet-black blade. It emits jet-black spiritual energy.*While [Equipped], once per combat, make a [Weapon Attack] after [Damage Calculation].

name: Ancestral Seven-Branched Sword
effect: *A seven-branched sword that was converted into an artificial regalia after being passed from generation to generation, hailing from ancient times. It contains extremely powerful spiritual energy.*While [Equipped], increase [Physical Damage] to non-[Boss] [Mononoke] by +10.

name: Avatar Urumi
effect: *An Urumi with three blades. Attacks made with it are deadly, and resemble a kamaitachi.*While [Equipped], increase the [Range] of the user's [Physical Attacks] by 2 Sq. (If [Engaged], it becomes 3 Sq., if [Charge 2 Sq.], it becomes [Charge 4 Sq.]).

name: Divine Soul's Seven-Branched Sword
effect: *A seven-branched sword created long ago during the time of the gods, converted into an artificial regalia. They contain a terrifying level of power.*While [Equipped], increase [Physical Damage] to non-[Boss] [Mononoke] by +10.

name: Goujian Sword
effect: *An artificial regalia replica of the famous sword possessed by Goujian, the king of Yue, which existed in the late spring and autumn period.*While [Equipped], reduce [Damage] received from [Mononoke - Godhunters] by 5.

name: Alchemy / Spirit Javelin
effect: *A sharp longspear produced by a Last Creator.*Can be thrown as a [Ranged Attack]. When doing so, change [Physical Attack / Range / Target] to [Ranged Attack / {Agility}+3 Sq. / 1#].

name: Alchemy / Spirit Spear
effect: *A longspear produced by a Last Creator.*While the [Weapon] is [Equipped], increase the [Range] of the user's [Physical Attacks] by +1 Sq. (If [Engaged], it becomes 2 Sq.; if [Charge 2 Sq] it becomes [Charge 3 Sq]).

name: Exorcist Vajra
effect: A Vajra that was strengthened via spiritual energy. It can be launched at an opponent via one's own spirit energy. Can be thrown as a [Ranged Weapon]. When that happens, change [Physical Attack / Range / Target] to [Ranged Attack / {Agility} + 3 Sq. / 1#].

name: Triple Dagger
effect: *This dagger contains a special, spirit-energy powered mechanism that allows the tip to expand in three directions. As such, it has excellent defensive capabilities.*While [Equipped], reduce [Damage] received from [Form: Sword / Axe] by 5.

name: Ring of Spears
effect: *A set of six rings, engraved with alchemic spells that summon spears. With them, you can create and control spirit spears.*While [Equipped], the target can [Equip] [Alchemy /○○] [Weapons] or [Protectors] (→p48-p63). Also, the target also gains +[100G] to the [Cost] limit of the [Consumables] created with <<Tool Refinement>>.

name: Kettu Kari
effect: *An artificial regalia created out of a long club used in a martial art called Kalaripayattu. The handle, carved from a sacred tree, is harder than steel.*While [Equipped], treat as though [Equipped] with [Unarmed]. Also, once per combat, make a [Weapon Attack] after [Damage Calculation].

name: Magic Spear
effect: *An enchanted spear that enhances it's own power by absorbing magical power from its user.*While [Equipped], by spending 1x [Start] and 3 {HP}, for the rest of combat the user gains +3 [Physical Damage].

name: Wheel Vajra
effect: *A wheel-shaped version of the Vajra. It has high power when thrown.* Can be thrown as a [Ranged Weapon]. When that happens, change [Physical Attack / Range / Target] to [Ranged Attack / {Agility} + 3 Sq. / 1#].

name: Beast Slayer
effect: *This polearm runs the length of a shortsword and has a rainbow-colored tip.* While [Equipped], when making [Physical Attacks] against [Class: Beast - Mythical], gain +2 [Physical Rank].

name: High-Frequency Spear
effect: *A specialized spear-type regalia optimized for artificial bodies. It uses spirit energy to vibrate it's tip at an extremely high frequency, allowing it to penetrate the toughest of armor.*While [Equipped], reduce the [Target] of the user's [Physical Attack]'s [Armor] by 5 (to a minimum of 0).

name: Tri-Breaker
effect: *An enhanced triple dagger. It boasts high power and excellent defense.*While [Equipped], reduce [Damage] received from [Form: Sword / Axe] by 5.

name: Ancient Spear
effect: *A spear of unknown origin that holds a long history. It's long grip and unstable spirit energy make it difficult to handle.*While [Equipped], increase the [Target] of the user's [Physical Attack] by 1#.

name: Black Fang Spear
effect: *A spear with a jet-black tip and long handle. It emits black spirit energy from it's tip.*While [Equipped], increase the [Range] of the user's [Physical Attacks] by 2 Sq. (If [Engaged], it becomes 3 Sq., if [Charge 2 Sq.], it becomes [Charge 4 Sq.]).

name: Ring of the Magic Spear
effect: *A set of six rings, engraved with alchemic spells that summon magic spears. With them, you can create and control spears made from spirit energy.*While [Equipped], the target can [Equip] [Alchemy /○○] [Weapons] or [Protectors] (→p48-p63). Also, the target also gains +[100G] to the [Cost] limit of the [Consumables] created with <<Tool Refinement>>.

name: Seven Vajra
effect: *A Vajra with six extra blades and tips. It contains a tremendous power.* Can be thrown as a [Ranged Weapon]. When that happens, change [Physical Attack / Range / Target] to [Ranged Attack / {Agility} + 3 Sq. / 1#].

name: Rune Spear
effect: *A longspear used by ancient Celtic warriors. Runes of victory are engraved up and down it's length, granting it massive power.* While [Equipped], when making [Physical Attacks] against [Class: Humanoid - Beast - Mythical], gain +1 [Physical Rank].

name: Nine Vajra
effect: *A Vajra with eight extra blades and tips. It's spiritual power is close to that of the legendary sacred treasure, the original Vajra.* Can be thrown as a [Ranged Weapon]. When that happens, change [Physical Attack / Range / Target] to [Ranged Attack / {Agility} + 3 Sq. / 1#].

name: Demon Vajra
effect: *A nine-bladed Vajra with a demon's face etched onto the handle. When shaken, it exerts spiritual power equivalent to the words of a god.* Can be thrown as a [Ranged Weapon]. When that happens, change [Physical Attack / Range / Target] to [Ranged Attack / {Agility} + 3 Sq. / 1#].

name: Magus Halberd
effect: *A powerful spear-type artificial regalia created by a high-ranking alchemist.*While [Equipped], increase the [Range] of the user's [Physical Attacks] by 2 Sq. (If [Engaged], it becomes 3 Sq., if [Charge 2 Sq.], it becomes [Charge 4 Sq.]).

name: Alchemy / Spirit Sickle
effect: *A sharp combat sickle produced by a Last Creator.*While [Equipped], gain +2 to [Barrier].

name: Alchemy / Spirit Battleaxe
effect: *A double-headed axe made for combat, produced by a Last Creator.*While [Equipped], once per combat, increase [Physical Rank] by 1.

name: Defender Axe
effect: *A tomahawk made for hand-to-hand combat, created with modern technology. It features excellent defensive ability.*While [Equipped], gain +2 to [Armor] and [Barrier].

name: Ring of Axes
effect: *A set of six rings, engraved with alchemic spells that summon axes. With them, you can create and control spirit axes.*While [Equipped], the target can [Equip] [Alchemy /○○] [Weapons] or [Protectors] (→p48-p63). name: Magic Battleaxe
effect: *A battleaxe forged with metal that is easily conductive to spiritual power. It is favored by magical warriors.*While [Equipped], when making a [Magical Attack], gain +3 to [Magical Damage].

name: Axe Shield
effect: *A special shield that can also be used in hand-to-hand combat as a weapon. The side of the shield features a huge blade.*While [Equipped], gain +3 to [Armor] and [Barrier].

name: Granite Axe
effect: *A mysterious granite battleaxe that holds a special magical power that lets it manipulate magnetic force.* While [Equipped], when making [Physical Attacks] against [Class: Mechanical], gain +1 [Physical Rank].

name: Double Axe
effect: *A small double-edged axe improved into a nunchaku-style. It is difficult to handle, but its power is enormous..*While [Equipped], treat as though [Equipped] with [Unarmed]. Additionally, once per combat, perform x1 [Weapon Attack] after [Damage Calculation].

name: Ring of the God Axe
effect: *A set of six rings, engraved with alchemic spells that summon powerful axes. With them, you can create and control axes made from spirit energy.*While [Equipped], the target can [Equip] [Alchemy /○○] [Weapons] or [Protectors] (→p48-p63). name: Magic Scythe
effect: *A powerful warscythe-type artificial regalia favored by magical warriors.* While [Equipped], once per round, reduce [Physical Damage] received from a [Range: Engaged] target by 10.

name: Blade Spinner
effect: *A special, bladed weapon that rotates rapidly when infused with spirit energy. The rotation also allows protection against ranged attacks.* While [Equipped], once per round, reduce [Physical Damage] received from a target outside of [Range: Engaged] by 10.

name: Black Ronin
effect: *A tomahawk-style artificial regalia made for close-quarters-combat typically used by special forces.*While [Equipped], reduce [Physical Damage] received from a [Range: Engaged] target by 5.

name: Funeral
effect: *A battlescythe with a blade enchanted with multiple layers of spells, allowing it to easily slice through human bodies.* While [Equipped], when making [Physical Attacks] against [Class: Humanoid], gain +1 [Physical Rank].

name: Heat Claw
effect: *A close combat weapon optimized for artificial bodies. This burning blade is mounted on the elbow or back of the hand.*While [Equipped], treat as though [Equipped] with [Unarmed].

name: Artisan Chainsaw
effect: *A modified, chainsaw-type artificial regalia empowered with the concept to cut plant-based mononoke.* While [Equipped], when making [Physical Attacks] against [Class: Plant], gain +2 [Physical Rank].

name: Black Godscythe
effect: *This warscythe constantly releases dark spirit energy from it's jet-black blade.* While [Equipped], when making [Physical Attacks] against [Class: Humanoid / Plant], gain +2 [Physical Rank].

name: Genocide Pendulum
effect: *A reinforced leather pendulum. The jet-black blade has terrifying power..*While [Equipped], once per round, change an [Attack Action] to [Range: 5 Sq].

name: Crusade
effect: *A further improved variant of the Axe Shield. The name comes from it's huge, distinctive cross shape.*While [Equipped], gain +4 to [Armor] and [Barrier].

name: Blade Monsoon
effect: *An enhanced version of the Blade Spinner. The name comes from the fact that it emits a tremendous wind each time it's used.* While [Equipped], once per round, reduce [Physical Damage] received from a target outside of [Range: Engaged] by 10.

name: Alchemy / Spirit Sledge
effect: *A rugged sledgehammer produced by a Last Creator.*While [Equipped], gain +2 to [Armor].

name: Alchemy / Spirit Guards
effect: *Powerful leg and hand protection, produced by a Last Creator.*While [Equipped], treat as though [Equipped] with [Unarmed].

name: Jitte
effect: *An artificial regalia made from an iron club, with a small hook attached. Defends well against weapons with blades..*While [Equipped], once per round, reduce [Form: Sword - Axe] [Physical Damage] by 5.

name: Remodeled Tekkou
effect: *The back of the hand and leg are uniquely modified with artificial regalia.*While [Equipped], treat as though [Equipped] with [Unarmed].

name: Battering Ram
effect: *A heavy iron club used to destroy castle gates, originally used by mounting it on a cart..*While [Equipped], when making a [Physical Attack], reduce the [Targets] [Armor] by 5 (To a minimum of 0).

name: Spirit Nunchaku
effect: *A nunchaku that has been improved with spiritual power that permeates the entire weapon. It is beautifully decorated.*While [Equipped], treat as though [Equipped] with [Unarmed]. Additionally, once per combat, the user may perform x1 [Weapon Attack] after [Damage Calculation].

name: Block Shield
effect: *A modified shield-type artificial regalia specialized in defense, but modified to be used offensively.*While [Equipped], gain +4 [Armor] and [Barrier].

effect: *A set of six rings, engraved with alchemic spells that summon Hammers. name: Chain-Weight Jitte
effect: *A jitte with weighted chains attacked. Using them, it's possible to make long-range attacks.*While [Equipped], once per round, reduce [Form: Sword - Axe] [Physical Damage] by 5.

name: Five-Pointed Star Gloves
effect: *White gloves with a pentagram symbol on the back of the hand.*While [Equipped], treat as though [Equipped] with [Unarmed]. Additionally, gain +5 [Magical Damage].

name: Demon Tekkou
effect: *Open-finger gloves with a terrifying visage on the back of the hand.*While [Equipped], treat as though [Equipped] with [Unarmed].

effect: *A set of six rings, engraved with alchemic spells that summon powerful hammers. name: Historic Tekkou
effect: *A tekkou that has been strengthened after many years of battle. It takes great skill to wield.*While [Equipped], treat as though [Equipped] with [Unarmed].

name: Silver Sledgehammer
effect: *A large sledgehammer coated in silver. It takes strength to wield, but its power is tremendous.*While [Equipped], the [Target] of the user's [Attack Actions] reduce [Armor] by 6 (to a minimum of 0).

name: Combat Power Arm
effect: *A humanoid heavy weapons platform operated by mechanized soldiers on board.*While [Equipped], treat as though [Equipped] with [Unarmed]. Additionally, increase  [Armor] and [Barrier] by 2.

name: Monk Guard
effect: *An arm and leg covering that has the blessing of the earth. It is both sturdy and light..*While [Equipped], treat as though [Equipped] with [Unarmed].

name: Invincible Shield
effect: *A block shield which has been further strengthened. In addition to being usable as a weapon, it has high defensive ability.*While [Equipped], increase [Armor] and [Barrier] by 5.

name: Undead Masher
effect: *A further refined silver sledgehammer. It has engravings on the head which are especially effective against undead enemies.*While [Equipped], when performing an [Attack Action] on [Class: Undead], increase [Rank] by 2.

name: Warlord Battering Ram
effect: *A superior version of the battering ram. The wielder may play a vital role in combat, like a legendary warlord themselves.*While [Equipped], once per session when making a [Physical Attack], reduce the [Armor] of the [Target] by 20 (to a minimum of 0).

effect: *A powerful large pistol or rifle produced by a Last Creator.*While [Equipped], increase [Physical Damage] to [Mononoke] by 5.

effect: *Heavy weapons-type Artificial Regalia produced by a Last Creator.*While [Equipped], once per combat while making a [Physical Attack], increase [Physical Rank] by 1.

effect: *A strong bow created by a Last Creator.*While [Equipped], once per round by spending [Timing: Prep], increase [Physical Damage] dealt to [Aramitama] by 5.

effect: *An automatic pistol-type Artificial Regalia produced by a Last Creator, based on the Sig Sauer.*While [Equipped], once per combat, the [Range] of the user's [Physical Attacks] gets +2 Sq. .

effect: *An AI-equipped assault rifle designed for mechanized soldiers.*While [Equipped], once per round, increase the [Target] of a [Physical Attack] by 1#.

effect: *A legendary horse from traditions and folklore that appears in a spiritual form. It mainly appears before summoners.*While [Equipped], the user may make [Ranged Attacks] and [Magical Attacks] after a [Combat Move].

effect: *A firearm-type regalia that fires shots using various magical reagents instead of regular bullets. Its form varies.*While [Equipped], once per round when using a Talent to make an [Attack Action], increase the [Damage] by 5.

effect: *An extra-large pistol that converts negative spiritual energy into a bullet.*While [Equipped], reduce the [Armor] of the [Target] of the user's [Physical Attack] by 5 (to a minimum of 0).

effect: *A sniper-class artificial regalia based on the PSG-1.*While [Equipped], when making a [Physical Attack] on a [Target] that is more than [Range: 5 Sq] away, increase [Physical Damage] by 5.

name: ※ Curse Gun

effect: *A magical hunting gun blessed by the devil.*While [Equipped], when the user succeeds at an [Active Check], they gain +1 at [Damage Calculation], however when the [Active Check] is a failure, they instead lose 10 {HP].

effect: *A sniper rifle-class regalia used during World War II. It is difficult to handle, but its power and accuracy are high.*While [Equipped], by spending [Timing: Start], the user gains +1 [Rank] on [Damage Calculation].
